org.validator.services.engine

Class ValidatorEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.validator.services.engine.ValidatorEngine

  • public class ValidatorEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The validator engine orchestrates and controls the execution of the test suite. A ValidatorEngine consists of two main components, the repository metadata and a collection of tests. The metadata in the Repository will be validated using Test instances. Each time the engine runs, the execution of each test is timed.
    Author:
    danielgalassi@gmail.com

      The time in milliseconds when the ValidatorService was triggered.
      private java.util.Vector<Test> testSuite
      The test suite consists of one or more Test implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • setRepository

        public void setRepository(Repository repository)
        Sets the repository file to assess in this validator engine.
        Parameters:
        repository - metadata repository object

      • setStartTime

        public void setStartTime(long serviceStartTime)
        Sets the stopwatch to measure the time taken to validate the repository.
        Parameters:
        serviceStartTime - start time of the validator service in milliseconds

      • setTestSuite

        public void setTestSuite(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                java.lang.String testCatalog)
        Loads all tests creating a suite.
        Parameters:
        context - the scope of the current session
        testCatalog - directory where all tests are stored

      • setResultCatalogLocation

        public void setResultCatalogLocation(java.lang.String resultCatalogLocation)
        Sets the internal directory all results will be saved to.
        Parameters:
        resultCatalogLocation - path to the target directory

      • isTestSuiteEmpty

        public boolean isTestSuiteEmpty()
        Method to verify tests have been loaded.
        Returns:
        true when no tests are available for this engine

      • addTest

        public void addTest(java.io.InputStream testStream)
        Appends one test script to internal test suite
        Parameters:
        testStream - a test case

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the validation of the repository metadata using all test scripts loaded. Upon completion, an index document (catalogue) is created. Each entry in this catalogue points to a result file.

      • ready

        private boolean ready()
        Validates the repository and test suite have been setup and are available.
        Returns:
        true if all dependencies are met

      • createIndexDocument

        private void createIndexDocument(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> resultRefs)
        Generates a catalog file with a list of tests.
        Parameters:
        resultRefs - a Map with a (result file, elapsed time) entry for each test executed
